title: Templating Schema
description: The schema regarding Swate templating-related JSON files.

templateId.description: A unique identifier for a template.

templateName.description: The name of the Swate template.

version.description: The current version of this template in SemVer notation.

type.description: The type of template used: Sample; Extraction; Measurement; Computation.

description.description: The description of this template. Use few sentences for succinctness.

docslink.description: The URL to the documentation page.

er.description: A list of all ERs (endpoint repositories) targeted with this template. ERs are realized as Terms: <term ref here>

tags.description: A list of all tags associated with this template. Tags are realized as Terms: <term ref here>
